name: resumeai-monorepo
description: AI-Powered Resume Builder - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../backend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --prefix frontend && npm run typecheck --prefix backend

author: Your Name
